scripts.run:isolated-server: npm run rm:isolated-server; docker run --name zilliqa-msw-gen -d -p 3333:5555 --entrypoint isolatedServer zilliqa/zilliqa-isolated-server:a01fe00 -t 0 -f boot.json -u 0
scripts.rm:isolated-server: docker stop zilliqa-msw-gen | xargs docker rm
scripts.test: npm run test:gen && npm run test:local && npm run rm:isolated-server
scripts.test:gen: npm run run:isolated-server && CONTAINER=zilliqa-msw-gen INPUT=tests ts-node index.ts
scripts.gen:docker: npm run run:isolated-server && CONTAINER=zilliqa-msw-gen INPUT=input ts-node index.ts
